name: ZEF
description:
Pony Island meets FEZ?

This is the interdimensional FORBIDDEN FRUIT, there are 4, one in each level, grab them to escape interdimensional Limbo before the evil traps you forever. Every room has its own logic.

Your character can move. Your character can sometimes jump. Jumping can have side effects if you look at your feet. The camera is OP. And if you cowardly try to escape this game challenges, you will not have no options.

SOME CITES:

“This game fuckin' rules.”  -Some Guy from Hard Drive

"This games has a multidimensional perspective of the world" -Friedrich Nietzsche

"I made the trailer" -Hideo Kojima

"If You Want To Change The World, Start With Yourself First" -Somebody
